projects.title: Final Degree Project
projects.description: 3D Game Engine with ECS Architecture: The project is a custom, simple, game engine written in C++ with SDL and OpenGL. It included a ECS architecture over some subsystems, mainly a graphic engine, a physics engine, an input engine and a custom console. One of the hardest tasks was fully developing and testing a custom header only math library for it. Another hard task was developing and testing an interface to decouple OpenGL from the graphic engine, to allow a possible API swap in the future.
